thought: Implement the mainWorkflow to connect the manual trigger, AI joke generation, and Slack message sending.
plan: Use manual trigger output as input to mainWorkflow.
Build the AI prompt messages in the workflow input_data for joke generation.
Call aiCompletion action with the built input_data.
Extract the generated joke from AI output.
Prepare Slack input with the joke text and channel #jokes.
Call Slack action to send the message.
Return Slack action output as final output.
criticism: Current mainWorkflow is not implemented, so the workflow cannot run end-to-end.
